---
title: "Linked D3 Scatter Plots"
output: html_document
---

This is a demonstration of the linked D3 scatterplot htmlwidget.

```{r}
library(linkedscatter)
library(ISLR)
data(Auto)
```

```{r firstPlot}
linkedscatter(Auto, x='weight', y='mpg', tooltip='name', linked=TRUE)
```

```{r secondPlot}
linkedscatter(Auto, x='acceleration', y='mpg', tooltip='name', linked=TRUE)
```
